description: Try our easy to follow Creme Egg Chocolate Brownies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Creme Egg Chocolate Brownies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the butter, chocolate and brown sugar in a saucepan and stir over a medium heat until melted and smooth. Remove from heat and whisk in the eggs.
Add the sifted flour, cocoa and baking powder and stir until well combined. Pour into a greased and base lined 28x18cm slice pan.
Bake in a moderate oven (180Â°C) for 30 minutes. Top evenly with Cadbury Creme Eggs and press in a little. Bake for a further 5-7 minutes until the eggs are just melted.
Cool on a wire rack before cutting into 12 pieces. Store in an airtight container until required.
